## Introduction
**Lupo** is an easy way to make good looking **Cross-Platform** User Interfaces for using Python.

## Support

- ✅ &nbsp; MacOS _is Supported_
- ❌️ &nbsp; Windows ***is not Supported yet***
- ❌️ &nbsp; Linux ***is not Supported yet***

## Installation

````
pip install lupo
````
